The study design randomize controlled trial conduct fifteen inner-city middle school Houston , Texas . Five school randomly assign risk avoidance intervention , five risk reduction intervention , five comparison ( standard care ) condition . Approximately , 1,800 7th grade student recruit study follow three-year period . Based formative study , pilot study , input community group national panel expert , two comparable curriculum develop . The risk avoidance curriculum emphasize sexual abstinence marriage include requirement abstinence education define Title V , Section 510 . The risk reduction curriculum emphasize abstinence address condom contraceptive use . The risk avoidance risk reduction intervention consist age-appropriate classroom curriculum CD-ROM-based tailor intervention deliver 7th 8th grade . Each intervention deliver trained facilitator . The effect intervention evaluate assess sexual risk-taking behavior participant intervention ( proportion student initiate sexual intercourse , proportion sexually active , number time unprotected sex , number sexual partner ) relative comparison group . Risk assessment data student collect use audio computer-assisted self-interview ( ACASI ) approach collection baseline , 6- , 18- , 24-month data .
